== Parassala (CT) (628547) ==

Parassala (CT) is a town in the [[Neyyattinkara]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 10.81 sq. km. and harbouring 8344 households with total population of 34096 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuarm]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 30 km. Male population is 16761 and female population is 17335. Scheduled Caste population is 2632 and Scheduled Tribes population is 81. Census Location Code of the town is 628547<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 30 km. Railway station is at Parassala at a distance of 0 km.
